name: Bug Survival
description:
It's a game where you fight bugs. It was made for the game off 2021.

Game Off 2021 : https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2021

Source Code : https://github.com/Darksorcen/Bug-Survival

CONTROLS

move : WASD or ZQSD or arrow keys

shoot : left click

switch weapon : F

I hope you enjoy the game. :)
